question: Which special day is observed on October 24 every year, to honour the virologist Jonas Salk?
explanation:
October 24 is observed as World Polio Day every year, to commemorate the birth anniversary of the American virologist Jonas Salk.
He led the first team to develop the vaccine against Polio. World Polio Day was established by Rotary International, to caution the countries in their fights against Polio. Recently, the African region was certified as wild poliovirus free.
